snippet: The photographer Ben Franke captures the motion of parkour, showing a split second in time and implying what’s to come.
abstract: Photographer Ben Franke captures images of parkour enthusiasts exuding vapor trails of flour as they perform their movements; flour clouds help to define trajectory of movements.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Ben Franke captures the motion of parkour, showing a split second in time and implying what’s to come.

headline.main: Showing Parkour as Dust in the Wind
